question: After working in your department for over 3 years, you feel the need to switch your department.Write a letter to your boss requesting a change in the department. In the letter mention: * Why do you want to switch departments? * Which department would you prefer?* Why do you think you are a good fit in that department?
text: I am writing this letter to you in relation to shifting the department in which I am working for over three years.

Although there are myriad new things which I learned from this branch yet I felt the need to switch because it has a great number of people in it due to which people are facing issues to allocate and assign the duties to the employees. Also, I am facing a coordination problem in this branch due to which I want a change in my regular tasks.

Currently, I am in the Sales department and now I want to switch to another one. It would be more convenient for me if you could please transfer me to the Marketing branch as I have previous knowledge of this field as well.

I have studied this as a subject at school and college levels. Thus, I am able enough to handle the work related to this subject. Moreover, I was working in this field for 4 years in my  previous firm which made me more experienced and qualified for this position. Therefore, It would be really commendable if you could process my request.
Hope you will take this into your consideration.
